name: MECHAHORN
description:
MECHAHORN is a game I made with my friends for Ludum Dare #32, with the theme "An Unconventional Weapon".

You play as a buff soldier who goes on a journey to learn about the power of friendship and save all the cuteness in the world from a mad scientist, using the amazing powers of a mysterious cake-powered robotic unicorn suit.

Controls: Arrows move around and aim your horn gun.

A shoots, S jumps, D fires missiles.
